name: Prism (itch) (Gazpins)
description:
Waking up in a cell with no memory, Cypress needs to find out what’s happening — and more importantly, a way out. The only person around is Walter, a scientist who may be more than he seems. 

Prism is a visual novel about the mind, change, and being locked up. This demo contains the first section. The full game will include 5 sections with multiple endings and will be released in 2023.

This is my first time making a visual novel (and game), so any feedback is greatly appreciated. Thank you!

Credits
  • Words, art, and game by Gazpins
  • Original soundtrack and SFX by niftyneatclub
